mapper.select: select org_code orgcode, exe_csqn applyid, result_date bgrq, patient_id patientid, patient_type,patienttype, inhosno from lis_test_reg where is_adjustSample='1' and exe_csqn is not null and exe_csqn != '' and result_date is not null and result_date>=to_date(#{begtime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and result_date<=to_date(#{endtime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
